title: How to Structure a Node + Express Project
content: Organizing your Node application well is key to long-term maintainability. We walk through a clean project structure with routes, controllers, and services.

title: Basic File I/O in Node.js
content: Node.js has built-in support for reading and writing files. This post walks through the `fs` module and practical examples using both callbacks and promises.

title: Middleware in Express Explained
content: Middleware is at the heart of every Express app. Understand how it works and how to write your own custom middleware functions.

title: Error Handling in Express: Best Practices
content: Robust error handling is essential in any web app. This guide covers how to handle errors gracefully in your Express routes and middleware.

title: Building Your First CRUD App with Node and Express
content: In this tutorial, we walk through building a simple Create-Read-Update-Delete blog application using Node.js, Express, and EJS templates.
